title: A Deadly Obsession:  Episode 20
description:
Today we head to Newport, South Wales.  In early 2011 a young, happy couple are excited at the prospect of their new baby, due to be born two weeks – on the 18th birthday of the father, Ryan.  Then one night changed all of their futures forever….

References
Nikitta: A Mother’s Story.  Marcia Grender
https://www.cps.gov.uk	
http://www.walesonline.co.uk
http://www.huffingtonpost.co.uk	
http://www.bbc.co.uk	
http://www.dailymail.co.uk	
http://www.southwalesargus.co.uk
